title: The Gatecrashers
description: Nick Everard and his son Paul return in this final chapter of the Everard saga. Paul commands a state-of-the-art midget submarine, sent to sneak up on the formidable German battleship Tirpitz and lay explosive charges. It's one step away from a suicide mission, but Paul must tryâ€”for if he fails, his father Nick's escort of an Arctic convoy hardly stands a chance.
author: Alexander Fullerton
